      void Badge.addReward(PlayerGroup group, GoalDAO goalDao, RuleDAO ruleDao)
      With this method a group awards an badge and adds it to the list with permanent rewards, but only if this badge isn't already in the list of permanent rewards.
      void Achievement.addReward(PlayerGroup group, GoalDAO goalDao, RuleDAO ruleDao)
      With this method a group awards an achievement and adds it to the list with permanent rewards, but only if this achievement isn't already in the list of permanent rewards.
